You made an order now what?

This is the process we follow for all our comissions.

  • Commission send

    We got mail!

    After reading what exactly you are looking for the task will be delegated to either Bozo or Lem Vari, depending on the subject/style.

  • Tell Us More!

    We like to hear from you!

    After the task has been delegated to one of us, we will contact you to have a call / meeting. Here we can ask you question about how you see the projects and if there are things we should consider.

  • First Sketch

    Design Arise!

    After the call/meeting, we will get to work on making a first draft, depending on the project the ETA may differ, But wel will keep in contact to give you an estimate.

  • Getting Closer!

    Fine tuning the design.

    After the first draft we will either redesign the project or start detailing it. We aim to deliver exactly what you envisioned!

  • Final
    Design
    Delivery!

Our Amazing Team

It's us!.

Bozo

Illustration, Props, SFX, Concept

Lem Vari

Illustration, Design, Concept, OC Creation

Grave Dwellers is a collective of 2 people with a passion for the arts!
